{"id":757278318,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1658845800,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"44 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/757278318/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int left =0;\n        int right = 0 ;\n        map <char ,int> m;\n        int ans =0;\n        while(right < s.size()){\n            char ch = s[right];\n            if(m.count(ch)>0){\n                left = max(left ,m[ch]);\n            }\n            ans = max(ans ,right-left+1);\n            m[ch] = ++ right ;\n        }\n        return ans ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
